divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the the stars from my deck on a typical beautiful Hawaiian night on the Big Island of Hawaii when I saw a shooting star cross the sky. I was looking up into the sky towards the East and the "star" flashed from north to south. Not a big deal................until it came to an instantaous stop and remained for more than 15 minutes. I did not blink for that 15 minutes, hoping it would move again and I didn't want to lose it, but it did not move again. My eyes began getting very dry and the object was not moving anymore, so I went back into the house.
Summary: I was looking at the stars on a dark and starry night.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kailua-Kona
There were no other sightings in Kailua-Kona on or around August 31st 2008
